name: part_000
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening intro sequence for Tokoyami Towa's Birthday Live 2024 'COLORFUL', featuring highlights from previous years and an introduction of the guest lineup.
Performance of 'Black Rock Shooter' by Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: ブラック★ロックシューター
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter

subtitles.original: どこへ行ったの？
subtitles.english: Where did you go?

subtitles.original: 聞こえますか？
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ叫べばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more do I have to shout?

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ泣けばいいんだろう
subtitles.english: How much more do I have to cry?

subtitles.original: もうやめて　私はもう走れない
subtitles.english: Please stop, I can't run anymore.

subtitles.original: いつか夢見た世界が閉じる
subtitles.english: The world I once dreamed of is closing.

subtitles.original: 真っ暗で明かりもない
subtitles.english: It's pitch black, with no light at all.

subtitles.original: 崩れかけたこの道で
subtitles.english: On this road that's starting to crumble.

subtitles.original: あるはずもないあの時の希望が見えた気がした
subtitles.english: I felt like I saw the hope of that time, which shouldn't even exist.

subtitles.original: どうして
subtitles.english: Why?

subtitles.original: ブラック★ロックシューター
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter

subtitles.original: 懐かしい記憶
subtitles.english: A nostalgic memory.

subtitles.original: ただ楽しかったあの頃を
subtitles.english: Of those days when things were just fun.

subtitles.original: ブラック★ロックシューター
subtitles.english: Black Rock Shooter

subtitles.original: でも動けないよ
subtitles.english: But I can't move.

subtitles.original: 闇を駆ける星に願いを
subtitles.english: I make a wish to a star racing through the darkness.

subtitles.original: もう一度だけ走るから
subtitles.english: Because I'll run just one more time.

subtitles.original: 怖くて震える声でつぶやく
subtitles.english: I whisper with a voice trembling with fear.

subtitles.original: 私の名前を呼んで
subtitles.english: Call my name.
